long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension is developed for automating task for internal users of TATA AIG. A certain task demands copying item id from URL of…
This extension is developed for automating task for internal users of TATA AIG. 
A certain task demands copying item id from URL of Vahancheck website and pasting it on QC website. 
This plugin will add a button to the UI of Vahancheck website, on click of which automatically user will be redirected to QC website.
The id will also be extracted automatically, thus reducing efforts of user
